metadata.description:
Hey sound.xyz community! I’m Pham and I’ve been making music since 2010. I’m excited to join you here from Poland and show you “Mantra”.

I wrote “Mantra” having in mind certain relationships and also experiences of isolation. It’s hard when certain people leave your life and sometimes it’s you that no longer can maintain.

At times I escaped into solitude, so called self-care. While it’s usually good, sometimes it’s easy to burn the bridges instead of confrontation - we push people away to protect ourselves - and sometimes that becomes our mantra, even if things get better. And I’ve seen spiritual people who weren’t that spiritual in the end.        It’s my second performance as a vocalist, and I want to invite you on my journey in making actual songs, not only instrumentals. I’m thrilled to hear what you think.

lyrics.text:
i don’t think we share a frequency
(i know that you’ve been a friend of me)
i appreciate your company
and honesty

but

lately i’ve been getting lot of light
gained new sights
yeah i see right through you
wanna spend my time alone
in my zen zone
i don’t wanna fight for you

i’m not out of touch
i need my peace
imma build these walls
we grow apart
burning bridges
watch as they fall

cold, but enough to hurt ya
letting go
easier said than done, yeah
can’t tell me nothing
that’s my mantra

don’t give me the eye
i’ll give you these charms
i can spot your lies
i’m sensing the harm
dancing on the edge
so i better cut you off like

toxicity
slowly getting hold of me
i need positivity
i can’t let you
i can’t let you

toxicity
slowly getting hold of me
i need positivity
i can’t let you
i can’t let you

metadata.name: Mantra #1
metadata.title: Mantra
